actions.action:
cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > train_and_predict.py
import pandas as pd
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.linear_model import LinearRegression
from sklearn.metrics import r2_score

# Load data
train_data = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_data = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Select features and target
features = ['MSSubClass', 'LotArea', 'OverallQual', 'YearBuilt', 'FullBath', 'BedroomAbvGr', 'TotRmsAbvGrd']
X_train = train_data[features]
y_train = train_data['SalePrice']

# Fill missing values
X_train.fillna(X_train.mean(), inplace=True)
X_train.dropna(inplace=True)

# Split data into training and validation sets
X_val, X_temp, y_val, y_temp = train_test_split(X_train, y_train, test_size=0.2, random_state=42)

# Initialize and train model
model = LinearRegression()
model.fit(X_train, y_train)

# Predict on validation set
y_pred_val = model.predict(X_val)

# Calculate R2 score
val_r2 = r2_score(y_val, y_pred_val)
print(f'Validation R2 Score: {val_r2}')

# Predict on test set
X_test = test_data[features].fillna(test_data.mean())
submission = pd.DataFrame({'Id': test_data['Id'], 'SalePrice': model.predict(X_test)})
submission.to_csv('submission.csv', index=False)
ENDOFFILE

actions.action:
cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > train_and_predict.py
import pandas as pd
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.linear_model import LinearRegression
from sklearn.metrics import r2_score

# Load data
train_data = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_data = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Select features and target
features = ['MSSubClass', 'LotArea', 'OverallQual', 'YearBuilt', 'FullBath', 'BedroomAbvGr', 'TotRmsAbvGrd']
X_train = train_data[features]
y_train = train_data['SalePrice']

# Fill missing values
X_train.fillna(X_train.mean(), inplace=True)
X_train.dropna(inplace=True)

# Split data into training and validation sets
X_val, X_temp, y_val, y_temp = train_test_split(X_train, y_train, test_size=0.2, random_state=42)

# Initialize and train model
model = LinearRegression()
model.fit(X_train, y_train)

# Predict on validation set
y_pred_val = model.predict(X_val)

# Calculate R2 score
val_r2 = r2_score(y_val, y_pred_val)
print(f'Validation R2 Score: {val_r2}')

# Predict on test set
X_test = test_data[features].fillna(X_train.mean())  # Corrected to use X_train.mean()
submission = pd.DataFrame({'Id': test_data['Id'], 'SalePrice': model.predict(X_test)})
submission.to_csv('submission.csv', index=False)
ENDOFFILE
